bug.author: wooksong
bug.summary: [Tests/Minor Bug] The custom filter test encounters a 'command not found' error
bug.description: ----------------------------omission------------------------- [ 158s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-0.2.1/tests/nnstreamer_filter_custom/runTest.sh: line 25: ldconfig: command not found ----------------------------omission------------------------- This error looks harmless and only occurs in gbs-build. However, we need to fix it In order to enable OpenCV test.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1548>#1548</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
